pageProduct.name: Alpha Keri Super Hydrating Shower & Body Oil 1 Litre
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Transform your skin with this advanced, multipurpose 3 in 1 daily cleansing treatment oil.  The soft lather gently cleanses and  rebalances moisture levels long after you shower.   Excellent in assisting to relieve skin irritation to protect & repair delivering instantly soft, smooth & supple skin. Enjoy soft velvety skin that hydrates continuously for 24 hours and wear your skin with pride.

Skin soothing & nourishing suitable for all skin types including:
• Normal, dry & very dry
• Sensitive
• Dermatitis & Eczema prone skin
• Ideal for baby & infants

Advanced skincare technology formulation:
o Lanolin Hydro Technology – 3-way action transforms moisture sapped, tight & dry parched skin – Hydrate, Restore & Protect
o Fragrance & colour free
o Dermatologically tested
o Water dispersible

Lanolin Hydro Technology - 3-way action transforms moisture sapped, tight & dry parched skin.
? Uber-moisturising super-hydrator lanolin carries 200% of its weight in water to infuse the skin with moisture. 
? Restore the skin lipids by assisting their function to hold moisture within the skin.
? Protect with a barrier on the skins surface locking moisture in and irritants out.

Warnings

Store below 30°C.
Recycable
External Use Only

Common Uses

Advanced 3 in 1 treatment with 24 hour proven hydration protection
Oil, Cleansing Treatment, Body oil, Cleansing

Ingredients

Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum) , PEG-8 Dilaurate , Lanolin Oil , Oxybenzone

Directions

Use daily in shower or bath, applied to wet or dry skin. Shower: Massage gently over the entire body including face avoiding the eye area.  Ideal as a lubricant for shaving legs and under arms.  Bathe for deeply moisturising treatment: Add 10-20mL in an adult’s bath or 5mL to baby’s bath. Moisturiser:  Apply to damp skin and pat dry as often as required. For external use only.
